name: Robo-E.R.T
description:
Have you ever played a two-player puzzle game with an idiot, well let me introduce you to Robo-ERT. Your friendly, super clever, and helpful companion through a two-player puzzle game.

Robo-ERT is a genius new AI who is way better than any 'friend' you would otherwise play with. (This is not legally binding)

Upgrade your companion and traverse the levels together. (Please do not upgrade Robo-ert to sentience, another uprising will not be permitted)

This is my first game jam, I hope you enjoy <3.

Unfortunately, I exported this wrong, making the file size quite a bit bigger than it should be. I can't amend this until after the jam, but I hope you still give my game a chance. <3

(WARNING: Pressure plates react poorly to being activated and deactivated in quick succession if you are trying to activate it and it isn't responding. Step off it for a second, then try again)
